description: After Annie and Oakley had identified Latias, Oakley`s Ariados was sent out to try to stop Latias, who was disguised as Bianca (Alto Mare), from getting away. It used String Shot to tie Latias up after it blocked her on the bridge from getting away. Oakley`s Ariados lost sight of Latias after Ash helped her escape by running through the city.
name: Ariados (Lions)
